document_data.name: Naren Dafyre
document_data.mainbody: '''Naren Dafyre''' was a merchant residing in [[Skullport]] in the late 15th century DR.  He was a lesser lord of the [[Mandible]] gang, a position he believed was too low for him.{{Cite dungeon/200/Backdrop: Skullport}}
document_data.History: One of Naren's ancestors was the original owner of the Dragon's Tooth sword, the sword that The Mandible's leader held as a badge of office.  Years prior to [[1479 DR]] the sword compelled Naren to leave [[Waterdeep]] and journey to Skullport where he lived ever since.  He clawed his way up the Mandible's hierarchy in an attempt to reclaim his ancestral sword.
